creator: gera_5959@hotmail.com
text:
When i enter my server on my own computer it shows what is supposed to show.
but when i try to look at my server in another computer the page doesnt 
appears.
this is what the error log says:
[Mon Feb 20 15:50:04 2006] [notice] Apache/2.0.54 (Win32) configured -- 
resuming normal operations
[Mon Feb 20 15:50:04 2006] [notice] Server built: Apr 16 2005 14:25:31
[Mon Feb 20 15:50:04 2006] [notice] Parent: Created child process 1208
[Mon Feb 20 15:50:04 2006] [notice] Child 1208: Child process is running
[Mon Feb 20 15:50:05 2006] [notice] Child 1208: Acquired the start mutex.
[Mon Feb 20 15:50:05 2006] [notice] Child 1208: Starting 250 worker threads.

i dont know if this is a bug or maybe its just me that i am doing somethiong 
wrong, but i could really use some help.

How are you trying to access the server from the other machines? Presumably with
it's IP address or local name (using localhost from another machine will not
work)? Are you sure you don't have a firewall blocking access to it?
creator: the_angry_angel@blueyonder.co.uk

text:
bugzilla's not a troubleshooting forum, please use the user@httpd peer to peer
support mailing list.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
